section.title: Description
section.p: Displays the body of the tag only if the OQL expression evaluates to true.

tr.td:
OQL SELECT projection expression. It must be a test, resulting in a 'boolean' in SQL : 0 or 1.
for the test expressions: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

section.title: Example
section.source: <mak:list from="best.Student s" where="s.person.birthdate <> nil" orderBy="s.name"> <mak:value expr="s.person.name"/> <mak:if test="s.person.hideAge = 0"> was born on <mak:value expr="s.person.birthdate" /> </mak:if> </mak:list>
